channel.title: CVE Feed for Ivanti -- Secure Access Linux
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Ivanti -- Secure Access Linux

item.title: CVE-2023-38544|2024-08-29T17:18:34.932Z -- ivanti -- secure%20access%20linux
item.description: A logged in user can modify specific files that may lead to unauthorized changes in system-wide configuration settings. This vulnerability could be exploited to compromise the integrity and security of the network on the affected system.

item.title: CVE-2023-46810|2024-08-02T20:53:21.932Z -- ivanti -- secure%20access%20linux
item.description: A local privilege escalation vulnerability in Ivanti Secure Access Client for Linux before 22.7R1, allows a low privileged user to execute code as root.

item.title: CVE-2023-46810|2024-07-15T17:30:26.691Z -- ivanti -- secure%20access%20linux
item.description: A local privilege escalation vulnerability in Ivanti Secure Access Client for Linux before 22.7R1, allows a low privileged user to execute code as root.

item.title: CVE-2023-46810|2024-05-31T17:38:31.425Z -- ivanti -- secure%20access%20linux
item.description: A local privilege escalation vulnerability in Ivanti Secure Access Client for Linux before 22.7R1, allows a low privileged user to execute code as root.
